TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LogFileCreationScheduleOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines which date to include in the names of the class log files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Assign one of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption> enumeration values to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A> property to specify which date to include in the names of its log files.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption Daily = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Include the current date in the log file name.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Do not include the date in the log file name.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption Weekly = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Include the first day of the current week in the log file name.
